featured.text: The temple celebrated Mazu Festival by hosting ten days of lion dances, Taiwanese operas, and traditional hand ______ shows.

definition.zh_def: 媽祖，海神信仰的女神，主要供奉於中國沿海地區，特別是福建和台灣。
definition.en_def: Mazu, the goddess of the sea in Chinese folk religion, primarily worshipped in coastal regions of China, especially in Fujian and Taiwan.
definition.example: Many fishermen pray to Mazu for safety before setting out to sea.
